Posts.Content: phillygirl wrote: I heard a couple years ago that there were medications we could take that would break down the proteins in the lymph fluid or something like that? My doctors never heard of it. Does anyone here know what I'm talking about? I had the name of the med, but I've forgotten it. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Medication for LE phillygirl phillygirl

Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2007 03:40PM phillygirl wrote: B0046, glad to see there's someone else who feels like me. It does seem so overwhelming. Go over to the "Why does this have to be so hard.." thread to hear my whining. I've decided I'm allowed, and so are you. This just really sucks. The only silver lining in this cloud for me was that the chemo ended my period at age 44.
